message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm initially proposing a price of $13,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $13,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price.  To make this work for both of us, I can come down to $11,500. This reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $11,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I appreciate your persistence. I've tried to come down to a price that reflects the value of the product. I'm willing to make my final offer at $10,500. This is my best price, and I believe it's a fair deal.
I understand that you're making a final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you reconsider?
